CLIENT_ERROR.MESSAGE: Does your device have internet access? Maybe is our fault and our servers are down

INTERNAL_ERROR.MESSAGE: Sorry, we are having internal issues. Try again later

PROGRAMMING_ERROR.MESSAGE: We suck, our code had a programming error and we didn't notice it. Send us an email!

NOT_FOUND_ERROR.MESSAGE: The page you are searching doesn't exist. You are being a bad guy or it's our fault.

FORBIDDEN_ERROR.MESSAGE: The page you're looking for is forbidden for your role. You're either being naughty or it's our fault.
